div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem ix die mensis Decembris
anno Domini mo iiijc lxxxmo /

quo die In iudicio comparens Alexander symson constituit et ordinavit
prouidem virum Thomam fife vnium balliuorum huius burgi suum verum procuratorem Ad pe
tendum exigendum et recuperandum nomine ipsius constituentis a Willelmo hay certam summam pecunie
sibi debit' per eundem Willelmum / et predicta pecunie summa prosequend' agend' et defendend'
prout Jura volunt necnon cum eodem Willelmo desuper componend' in latisima forma procuratorie
Et promisit de Rato de Judicio cisti et Judicantum soluj et cetera

Eodem die Andreas gilquhoin calumpniatus per Alexandrum Rede thesaurarium huius burgi
de foristallacione lane pellium et corriorum ac Regratacione denariatorum in patria
posuit se in voluntate de dicta calumpnia

Andreas Johneson' commorans in meldrum posuit se in voluntate thezaurarij de
empcione et foristallacione pellium

The sammyn' dai comperit before the Aldirman and ballies sittand in Jugement thomas robert
son seruitour til Dauid menyes yungar / the quhilk Dauid forspekar for the said thomas / sayde
that he wes persewit and strublit be gilbert riburn and put in perel of his life / quharof
he askit remede of law / And that the said thomas offerit him and was redy til vndirly Justi
ce and law for ony offens hurt or strublans committit or done be him to the saide gilbert /

Item the said Dauid menyes is becumin law borgh to the balyeis for the said thomas robertson
that gilbert riburn and his party salbe vndistrublit of the said thomas and his partie th vthir
wais than the cours of common' law wil / And til entir the said thomas before the balye
is of this burgh in the court of the sammyn til ansuer' and vndirly the law as said is quhat
tyme that he beis lauchfully warnyt tharto be the officeris

Item Alexander rede becom law borgh til thomas fife ane of the balyeis for gilbert riburn that
thom robertson and his partie salbe vndistrublit of the said gilbert and his party bot as
law wil And til entir the said gilbert as said is til vndirly the law for the strublans
of the said thomas quhat tym he beis warnit as forsaid is

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xjmo die Decembris
Anno Dominj supradicto quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera
Eodem die andreas cristison' accusatus posuit se in voluntate thezaurarij pro foristallacione huius burgi

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of the burgh of Abirdene be the balyeis
of the sammyn' the xv day of Decembre the yer' of god et cetera lxxx Thom of be
nyn litstar before the aldirman and ballies sittand in Jugement wes oblist his
hand vphaldin til content and pay til Johne of balgirschach the some' of
xij s' viij d' acht til him for certane quhite clath that he gaf him to lyt
and for the siluer that he had ressauit tilhaf lyttit the sammyn' clath / at thir
dais vndirwritin that is tosay the tane half of the said some' betuix
this and new yeris day next tocum / And the tothir half betuix candilmes and
fasternyevin next thareftir folowand but langar' dilay

the sammyn' dai It wes decretit ordanit and deliuerit be the Aldirman and consale anent
the debate betuix Alexander howison Dauid gethan and vthiris diuers' merchandis thar complicis
on the ta part / and Wilyeam of tulidef intromettour with certane gudis on the behalf of
Robert senyour merchand til thaim / on the tothir partie / that / is tosay / that the said William
of tulidef sal deliuer til the saidis merchandis the tane half of thare gudis as thare
bill' proportis / thai beand oblist til kepe the said Wilyeam scaithles anent Robert
senyor of samekil as thai ressaue / And that to do the said alexander and Dauid ar' oblist
be the fath of thar bodijs thare handis vphaldin in presence of the aldirman and consale forsaid

Item the same day / thomas scrogis has deliuerit til Thomas of fife ane of the bal
lies of this burgh / twa stakkis of bere / til content and pay til James andirson
burges of montros / twa chaldir of the sammyn bere for v merkis ilke chaldir / for a
certane some' of siluer acht be him to the said James to gude commpt and rekning / for
the quhilk the said James gudis was pavndit in Dundee / And this bere tobe
deliuerit til the said James at his gane cuming eftir the halydaies of yule

Item the sam dai before the balyeis in Jugement Duncan talyour grantit him tobe awand
til John' Wormot ij hamburgh barellis of salt salmond / quhilkis the balyeis chargit
him to pay and deliuer til the said John' within xv dais

xviij die Decembris anno Dominj et cetera lxxxmo / In pretorio coram Andrea branche vno bal
livorum huius burgi / Johannes fichet iunior fatebatur se debere henrico owrum iiijor libras
iiijor s' et vj d' vsualis monete in quibus eidem tenetur de resta cuiusdam obligacionis sue / vnde
dictus ballivus precepit eidem Johanni ad satisfaciendum dicto henrico de prefata summa infra xvnam futuram

Eodem die Thomas de fife Andreas branch Dauid menyes iunior et Johannes Wormot / ar
biter alias electi inter gilbertum Waus et Dauid Duncanj fatebatur se decretum
dedisse / quod idem gilbertus satisfaciet dicto Dauid Duncani de xvj s' in quibus
eidem tenetur ad diem Juridicum huius burgi post festum nativitatis Dominj nostri proximo futuro absque
vlteriori dilacione

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxij die Decembris anno
Dominj supra dicto /

quo die Dauid spens adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrectione ple
gij super Willelmum thekar de iniusta intromissione cum vno equo ipsius Dauidis et ipse
Willelmus quitus de sua calumpnia prout compertum fuit per assisam

Item cristinus Williamson manens in fivy et Willelmus scharp quieti et liber facti fuerunt
per assisam de iniusta intromissione cum quodam equo prefati Dauidis spens

The sammyn' dai It wes ordanit and deliuerit be ane sworn' assise / that fergus
blithe and Agnes his spous' sal furthwith devode and red til gilbert mori
son' his hous' that thai haf in tak of him / or than pay til the said gilbert
his mail acht of termes bigane

The ferd day of Januar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxx / Comperit before the Aldir
man and certane personis of the consale of aberdene In the tolbuthe Androw murra eldar in
the name of certane fraghtismen of the hulk callit Mary / and askit / that Alexander
trail maistir of the said schip suld fulfil and complete the condicionis made betuix
the merchandis and the said maistir / the allegiance of bath the parties herd and considerit
the said Aldirman and consale ordanis and deliueris / that the said Alexander trail sal
ansuere / to the saidis merchandis for thre quartaris of the said schip / and outred
the costis of the said iij quartaris / And thomas of scrogis awnar' of ane of the
thre quartaris bindis him and his quartar of the said schip to the said Alexander mastir
of the iij quartaris / that quhat expens' and costis that the said Alexander makis on the
said thomas quartar in his defaute / that the said Thomas sal vpayit and
content the said Alexander / for the quhilk he bindis his said quartar of the schip and the
fraght of the sammyn' toremain with the said Alexander' ay and quhil he his factouris
or assignais be fullely content and pait of the said costis and expens' / And gif the
said thomas outreddis and pais al costis and expens' as efferis tharto / of his
said quartar / than his said quartar and the fraucht / and proffitis tharof / salbe free and
redounde til him self

Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem
octauo die mensis Januarij Anno Domini mo iiijcmo lxxxmo Quo die sectis
vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum

Eodem die accedens ad barram henricus mortymar burgensis dicti burgi
protestacionem fecit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu decim solidorum sibi an
nuatim et hereditarie debit' ut asserit / de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico
de li grene inter terram Alexandri marnagh ex parte australi ex vna / et
terram hered' Johannis Webstar ex parte boriali partibus ab altera / et communionem viam re
giam versus oriens et terram Andree mare versus occidens / Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu recuperando preter terram et
lapides quos presentauit in curia coram ballivis in sacculo tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus Johanne Durward Johanne echtsy burgensibus et Dauid Dun
canj sergeando burgj

Item eodem die Johannes de narne carnifex prosecutus per plegium porrectum per Dauid
hil de iniusta detencione sex librarum a dicto Dauid / quitus factus fuit per
assisam proborum virorum de dicta summa / et idem Dauid in amerciamento curie pro iniusta ex
tensione dicti plegij

Item eodem die Actio et causa prosecucionis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis in capite vici naui
um inter terram Alexandri de camera ex parte boriali / et terram thome prat ex
australi parte / per collectorem et certos alios capellanos ecclesie beati Nicholai de
abirdene / super recuperacione dicte terre vaste in defectu solucionis vnius annuj red
ditus xiij s' et iiij d' / ex parte vna / et Alexandrum de camera clamantem se habere
Jus ad eandem terram ex parte altera / continuatur et Respectuatur sub spe concordie me
dio tempore tractande cum consensu dictarum parcium in eodem statu quo nunc est absque
preiudicio alicuius partis vsque ad proximam curiam capitalem huius burgi post festum
pasche immediate sequentis

The sammyn' dai Thomas of fife ane of the ballies of this burgh Rehersit /
that it wes decretit be the court / that Alexander Watson salhaf regres til his
foreland / becaus' george browne had fundin til him na souerty / for the pay
ment of his mail and for the vphalding of the sammyn' lande like as is conte
nit in ane act / made tharupon' of before

The xj dai of Januar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxx / the balyeis and consale of abirdene / has
ordanit and deliuerit / that Alexander menyes aldirman sal ryde til edinburgh anent the
outred of a tax clamit be our Soueran lord of the toun' / And tocommon' with the Elect
of Abirdene / anent the common' Seil the quhilk he desiris for the outred of his bullis
and anent the second tende gevin and assignit be vmquhile bischop Thomas for
the biging of the qvere

In the court haldin be the ballies of the burgh of Abirdene in the tolbuthe of that
ilke the xvij dai of Januar' the yer' forsaid Thomas of marr' was made quite
be ane sworn' assise of the wrangwis' intrometting with the sayl of the hulk Into
of the bote / And Alexander trail is convict be the sammyn assise of the wrangwis' intro
metting with the said sayle oute of the bote / for the quhilk he wes adiugit in
amerciament of this courte and til restore the sayle incontinent to the bote

The sammyn' dai Alexander trail chalansit of the wrangwis' intrometting with certane bar
rellis of ass' pavndit be him til Robert ewynson' / denyit the wrang the quhilk
was put til ane assise / and the assise tharupon diligently auisit / fand and deliuerit
that the said ass' suld be deliuerit to the merchandis

Item the sammyn' dai certane merchandis fraghtismen of the hulk complenyeit that thai
couthe get na seruice nor redschip of the skipparis like as thai war oblist
be thar chartir and indentur partie made betuix thaim tharupon' / the quhilk wes put
til the knawlage of ane assise of worthi burgez / and the assise tharupon'
riply avisit fand and deliuerit be gilbert the Waus forspekar / that the said
skipparis had nocht done til the merchandis forsaidis . that thai aucht tilhaf
done / for in thare defaute thai war nocht redy to sayle uhen wynd and
weddir seruit thaim and wrangit tharuntil / wpon' the quhilkis Alexander rede forspekar
for al the merchandis fraghtis men tuke ane Instrument / in Jugement before thir
witnez thomas of fife Androw branche twa of the balyeis Androw rettre Ro
bert rede philp of Dunbrek Duncan of stralogh seriandis and vthiris sindry

Item the said dai Alexander trail protestit before the balyeis in Jugement / that quhat actis
or Instrumentis war made or tane be the merchandis againis him sulde
turne him to na preiudice in tyme tocum / And in like wise that ony actis or instrumentis
that thomas scrogis tuke in contrar' of him sulde turn him to na preiudice et cetera

The sammyn' dai it wes fundin and deliuerit be a sworn' assise Robert blindsel for
spekar / that thomas scrogis sulde free Alexander trail of xviij pruys' merkis and
a half xij s' scottis for ilke pruys' merk / of ane obligacion' made til Johne
eldar of Dawkeith producit and schavin tharupon'

Curia tenta per ballivos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xviij die Januarij
anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo /

quo die Alexander trail prosecutus per plegium super eum Inuentum per
thomam de marr' de iniusta detencione septem marcarum et iiijor li' scot ab ipso
conuictus fuit per assisam proborum virorum Alexandro howison prelocutore existen' de
iniusta detencione dicte summe vnde adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie et ad satisfaciendum
eidem thome de dicta summa infra terminum Juris

Eodem die thomas de scrogis in amerciamento curie pro iniusta extencione plegij super Alexandrum trail
de xxvij libris / et dictus alexander quitus per assisam predictam de suo clameo antedicto

Item the sammyn' dai It wes fundin and deliuerit be the forsaid assise / that the skipparis
of the hulk callit mary wrangit in it that thai had downe Androw murray
eldaris gudis to the schip / and left thaim vnstollit in the schip as thai sulde
haf bene / for the quhilk thai aw til vprycht him in sa fer as his gudis
ar scathit

the samme dai marion' of tiry wes conuict be the assise for the wrangwis'
resset of certane cheis' of Alexander redis

Item the said dai William of tulidef grantit him tobe awand til thom of marr'
for fraght anent Robert senyour vij li' s' iij d' / of the quhilk some the
said thomas of marr' grantis him pait of xxx s' et cetera

The xix dai of Januar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxx Comperit before Thomas
fife ane of the ballies of Abirdene Thomas scrogis burges of the said burgh / and
grantit him awand til James andirson' burges of abirdene the Some' of twa pundis
gretis and sextene schillingis g' for certane walx the quhilk the said thomas
salde of his in Dundee extendand til the said some' Tobe pait to the said James
of his procuratouris factouris or assignais in flandris holand or Seland within
xv daies next eftir that the hulk callit Mary beis lossit in ony of the saidis
portis this next viage / And falyeand tharof / the said thomas scrogis has re
singit and be this present write resignis his Croft liand at the galou gate hede
on the eist syde of the kingis gate In the handis of the said thomas fife the balye
tobe prisit and salde tocontent and pay the said James of the said some' / fyve merkis
scottis for ilke pund g' within xv daies next eftir that certificacion cum fra beyond
the sey / that the said James his procuratouris factouris or assignais gatis na pay
ment of the said some' / as is before expremyt / witnez heirof gilbert the
Waus henry owrum androw ancroft Wil gray gilbert morison' burgez of abir
dene and vthiris sundry

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxij die Ja
nuarij anno Dominj supradicto /

quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata / quedam margreta
cuming conuicta per assisam amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione nutricis quondam Andree scherar'
et emendabit ad visum proborum virorum

In Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxixno die Januarij
anno quo supra / Johannes stewart adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie pro iniusta regracione
plegij inuenti per Walterum aghneif prout wardatum fuit per curiam / que ordinavit quod
idem Johannes respondebit dicto Waltero in continen' de perturbio

Eodem die Walterus achneif inuenit Dauid prat plegium legalem pro eo quod Johannes
stewart erit indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris Et eodemmodo idem Walterus deuenit plegius pro
dicto Dauid de indempnitate prefati Johannis stewart vt supra

Item Johannes stewart dedit Jacobum craik plegium legalem pro eo quod Walterus auch
nefe et Dauid prat erunt indempnes aliter quam per viam Juris

Item eodem die Johannes stewart conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione
Walteri aghnefe in verbo / et tenetur emendare ei ad visum proborum virorum
Et idem Walterus accusatus quitus fuit per assisam de perturbio dicti Johannis stewart

Item eodem die Johannes lammynton' in amerciamento pro iniusta porrectione plegij super Andream raa
carnificem de iniusta detencione xvj s' / et ipse Andreas quitus factus fuit per assisam pro
borum virorum / gilberto vaus prelocutore existen' / de suo clameo antedicto

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem primo die mensis februarij
anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo /

quo die ballivi per decretum curie assignauerunt Andree lambynton'
tercium diem instantis mensis responsurus peremptorie ad instanciam Willelmi blindsel Junioris super xij s'
nauli de quibus ipsum releuare tenetur ut asserit penes magnum Wormot

Eodem die Willelmus modan conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento / quia iniuste perturbauit
Jacobum craik in capcione certe farine empte per eundem Jacobum / et tenetur emendare eidem ad
visum proborum virorum

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem v die februa
rij anno Domini supradicto / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

The sammyn dai / Dauid galichtly callit as for the first dai toanswer' til the
borch strekit on him be James craik in the hand of alexander chamer seriand of the wrang
wis' halding fra him of xxx d' of siluer of the rest of a bonet / xiiij d' of a par'
of kairdis vij bow staffis and of xj faddom of gret tow price iij s' / comperit nocht / quhar
for the seriand was chargit til tak a distres of the said Dauid et cetera et towarn him
til the neste lauful court til ansuer' as the second dai of process'

Item the said dai / the assise has deliuerit / anent xxiiij s' g' clamit be Alexander nachti
fra Johne stevinson / that tharof the said John' stevinson sal pay xij s' g' til the said
alexander as he borowit it in flandris as it cumis til vij noblis for the li' g' within the
terme of law / And the tothir xij s' g' thai fynd in the handis of William moyses / of
the quhilkis the said alexander nachti haldis him fullely content

Willelmus Wenton' molendinarius et sponsa eiusdem quilibet in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione thome
baxtar vt inuentum fuit per assisam et tenentur emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum

Item the said dai Johne of Knollis thomas prat Dauid mathoson and Robert prat
arbitrouris chosin and sworn betuix Androw Wenton' and Johne litstar in the grene apon
a pipe of wald sald be the said androw til the said John' / Riply avisit / decretit and
deliuerit / that gif Androw Wenton' wald swere / that he sald nocht the said pipe of wald
til John' litstar with na warandis' bot totak it as it lay / that the said John litstar
suld content and pay til him tharfore vj li' within terme of law / the quhilk aith androw
Wenton' has sworn as said is in presence of the court / and the said John' chargit
to pay him the said some' within the said terme of law

Johannes chepman in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione vnius toge ab Alexandro scrogis prout deli
berant fuit per assisam quam togam adiudicatur restaurare eidem alexandro infra terminum Juris

In curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem ix die februarij anno quo supra
ballivi precipiebant Agneti baxtar ex concessione propria ad satisfaciendum patricio badenach
de xvj s' viij sibi per eandem debitis de resta firme sue infra xvnam futuram

The sammyn' dai thom chepman thomas of marr' and thomas scrogis comperit before the
balliez in Jugement / and deponit and declarit be thar' athis / that the said thomas scrogis
content and pait to Robert senyour on the name and the behalf of matho culan' thre
merkis and iiijor scot of pruys' monee / And the said Thomas scrogis grantis him awand
to the said matho xxti scot / quhilkis the balyes ordanit him tocontent within lauful dai

Alexander fynlau posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis lam
bynton' in presencia curie et tenetur emendare ei ad visum proborum virorum

Eodem die ballivi assignauerunt Andree lowson' diem lune ad octo dies proximo futuro ad
respondendum plegio super eundem porrecto per Johannem lamynton' de iniusta detencione viij s' et
vj denariorum ab eo pro certa quantitate tele late

Johannes talyour in amerciamento pro iniusta inuencione plegij aduersus Walterum achnefe / et adiudicatur satis
facere eidem Waltero de firma sua ut Jura volunt

Curia ballivorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xij die februarij anno Domini
et cetera lxxxmo

quo die Johannes eldar in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione x s' et vj d' a thoma
marr' ex parte vxoris sue ut inuentum fuit per assisam / et satisfaciet ei infra terminum Juris

The xvj dai of februar' the yer' forsaid / Dauid colison' producit henry owrum tobere
witnessing anent ane action vndirwritin / becaus' he wes redy tosail / quhilk the
gret aith sworn' and examinit deponit and declarit / that he by stude herd and saw and
for witnes was tane quhen William blindsel yongar becom oblist be the faith of
his body and ful dettour til Dauid colison' til content and pay him a last of Salmonde
within xv dais thareftir / the quhilk last of salmond the forsaid Dauid had content til
Copyne laurys for the said Williamis det / of the quhilk copyne dischargit
the said William and was content of Dauid colison' be his awne graunt / And this
was done before yule last by past / And this deposicion was tane and writin in
the tolbuthe before Thomas of fife alexander chamer and androw branch' thre of the balliez
of this burgh.

The sammyn' dai before the saidis balliez Arne Some sterman of the hulk callit
mary of abirdene producit be Dauid spens todeclare verite betuix him and Dauid
rury / the gret aith sworn' and diligently examinit deponit and declarit that he
by stude in androw hawdanis hous' in abirdene herd and saw quhen Dauid spens
lent til Dauid rury x s' scottis tilhaf gevin him agane iiij s' g' waryng
beyond the sey that next viage quhen he passit in otto Droshois schip of trail
sownde / And that rychtswa he by stude in brugis quhen loyk laris deliuerit and
pait til Dauid rury on the behalf of Dauid spens' viij s' g' and iij stickis of
quhite clath he wate nocht quhat thai contenit with certane futevel and lentrinware
he knew nocht how mony et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xixno die
mensis februarij Anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die ballivi assignauerunt thome quhite hodie ad quindenam ad respondendum plegio
per Alexandrum rolland et Walterum rolland filium suum super ipsum porrecto pro iniusta detencione
vnius libre grossorum causa mutui et xxviij solidorum g' de resta duarum librarum g'
ad bonum compotum vt Jura volunt

Item eodem die coram ballivis in Judicio Willelmus de tulidef promisit et obligavit se per extencionem
manus sue ad Dauid et deliberandum gilberto quhite certam ceram eidem alias adiudicat'
et ordinat' cum qua dictus Willelmus intromisit ex parte Roberti senyour / et hoc infra quinde
mensem proximum futurum sine vlteriori dilacione

Dauid hil conuictus fuit per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Alexandri
rede in verbo et tenetur emendare ei ad visum proborum virorum

Item eodem die thomas rolland adiudicatur per assisam ad soluendum domino Roberto leis ij s'
de resta maioris summe

Item eodem die Dauid galichtly secundo die vocatus responsurus plegio super eundem inuento per Ja
cobum craik vt patet in rotulamento primj diei processus Non comparuit / Ideo precipitur seriendo capere
districtum et cetera et premunire eum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad tercium diem huius placiti

Item eodem die Jacobus de Kintor super quem Willelmus moore porrexit plegium de
iniusta detencione quinque librarum ab eo ad bonum compotum primo die sepe vocatus ad respondendum
dicto plegio / non comparuit / quare precipitur alexandro de camera seriendo capere districtum de dicto
Jacobo et cetera et citare seu premunire eundem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

Item eodem die precipitur Johanni chepman iuniori per ballivos ex confessione sua propria ad satisfaciendum
Ade de craufurd duos salmones sibi debito infra xvnam futuram ad valorem ijorum solidorum
Et idem Johannes fidemedia obligatur ad persoluendum dicto Ade tres firlotas farine twis' schelde eidem
adiudicat' per assisam infra hinc et festum pasche proximo futuro absque vlteriori dilacione

Ballivi remiserunt Dauid hil amerciamentum hac vice pro perturbio alexandri rede sub ea condicione / quod quincumque conuictus
fuerit de tali perturbacione aut delicto / Statim et incontinen' soluet super communionem cistam viij s' absque remissione

The xxvj dai of februar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxx / thir personis vndirwritin ar chosin
and sworn' in presence of a nobil man Alexander lesly of wardris Ressauour general with
ordinance and consent of the Aldirman consale and the maist part of the communite of this burgh
tobe auditouris til Alexander of chavmeris acomptis of his office of aldirmanschip of
twa yeris / and of the gressomez / of the last assedacion / And anent the thrid yeris
compt / gif thai fynd that it be gevin and endit / that it stand as swa / and gif it
be nocht / that thai refourme it / And thir ar the names of the saidis Auditouris Johne
of Knollis Dauid colison' Thomas fife Robert blindsele Robert of culan' Alexander
rede alexander howison' gilbert the Waus and thomas prat / and tobe endit within
xv dais et cetera
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxvj die februarij predicti

Quo dies andreas lowson' in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione vij s' et vj d' a Johanne lambynton'
vt compertum fuit per assisam et satisfaciet eidem infra terminum Juris

the sammyn' dai lang Marion' wes convict be ane sworn' assise of the wrangwis'
taking of a kyrtil and of iij eln' of quhite clath fra Janet scot / quharfor scho wes adiu
git in amerciament and til restore the said kirtil and iij eln of quhite til the said Janet as
law wil et cetera

In curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xijmo die mensis marcij anno
Dominj et cetera lxxxmo Alexander Kyd procurator et procuratorio nomine Elisabeth skrymgeour sponse
honorabilis viri magistri Johannis lyon' de curtaston' peciit a Johanne talyour de li brade
guttar xiij s' iiij d' vsualis monete debito dicte elizabeth pro x vlnis pannj albi lanei / quj
quidem Johannes allegavit se soluisse dictam pecuniam et ad probandum solucionem eiusdem ballivi
assignauerunt dicto Johannj hodie ad quindenam

The sammyn' dai Dauid galichtly was adiugit be ane sworn' assise til content
and pay til James craik vij bow staiffis and xj faddom of gret tow price iij s' wpon'
the quhilkis he wes folowit be a borch / And for the wrangwis' withhalding tharof he
wes adiugit in amerciament and til content the said James within terme of law

James craik in amerciament for the wrangwis' borch strekin on Dauid galichtly of xxx d'
of the rest of a bonet and xiiij d' of a par' of kairdis

Item the said dai Dauid galichtly grantit in Jugement that he borowit a bonate fra
James craik / for the quhilk the balyeis chargit him til pay iiijor s' til the said
James within xv dais or ellis ane als' gude bonet

Eodem die prepositus ballivi et consules burgi de Abirdene cum consensu diuersorum burgensium communitatis
eiusdem dederunt concesserunt ac ad feodifirmam diviserunt prouido viro Thome prat
burgense dicti burgi hereditarie totam illam peciem terre sue vaste cum pertinenciis Jacentis
extra portas vici castri prope fontem angelicum ex boriali parte inter quendam ortum thome
scrogis versus oriens et communionem viam regiam versus occidens et montem ex boriali et signum sive
metam fluuij marinj ex australi partibus prout extendit in longitudine et latitudine
super quam edificare poterit vnum orreum / cum cauda Reddendo inde annuatim duodecim
denarios vsualis monete Scocie nomine feodifirme communitati huius burgi ad terminos in burgo
vsualis tantum pro omni alio seruicio clameo seu demanda et cetera iuxta tenorem vnij et
effectum carte inde sub Sigillo communi dicti burgi conficiende sibi de super concesse et cetera
Testibus Alexandro menyes tunc preposito Jacobo lesly Thoma fife Alexandro de camera filio
andrea branch ballivis Alexandro chavmer de murchil Dauid colison' Roberto blindsele
Alexandro rede gilberto Waus Dauid symson' Dauid mathoson' Willelmo blindsele
iuniore Jacobo craik macolmo mowet Johanne Wormot Alexandro scrogis Dauid galichtly
Willelmo moyses et iiijor seriendis burgi cum diuersis alijs ad premissa consencientibus et cetera

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xvij die mensis marcij post
merediem Anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo /

quo die Johannes sowtar commorans in Kintor accusatus
de iniusta perturbacione philippi de Drumbrek vnius seriendorum huius burgi / peciit
auisari / quo auisato per prelocutore suum Willelmum blindsele iuniorem posuit se in voluntate ballivorum
pro dicto perturbio vnde adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento et emendare parti vt Jura volunt

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xixno die
marcij anno quo supra

The quhilk dai malcom mowet in Jugement before the Aldirman balyeis and consale
producit and present ane Instrument of Alexander Dovy public notar tane and rasit in loyk
laris hous' in brugis be the said malcom be maner' of way of certificacion as the
said Instrument proportis concerning the some' of nyne pundis g' in the quhilk Dauid marr'
Androw branch and Dauid hil ar oblist and bundin to the said malcom as in thar lettres obli
gatouris producit in Jugement before the saidis Dauid Androw and Dauid at lynthe is conte
nit / the quhilkis lettres obligatouris of the said soume togiddir with the said Instrument
of certificacion war red in presence of the saidis personis / The quhilkis obligacionis
and Instrument togiddir with the kingis lettrez to ministre Justice anent the payment of the
said some' / the aldirman grantit that thai war present before him and / the balyeis in Juge
ment this dai viij dais quhilk was the xij dai of this instant moneth / the saidis
Dauid marr' and Dauid hil that day beand absent

Item the sammyn' dai comperit in Jugement Androw branch and Dauid marr' / and perofferit
thame tilvndirly the law before thar Jugez ordinaris anent the payment
of thare obligacionis clamit be malcom mowet / baith totak law and do law
And in siclike wise Dauid hil for his part of the said obligacionis perofferit til vndirly
his Juge ordinar' / And mareatour' the saidis Androw branch and Dauid marr' peroffe
rit to preve the saidis obligacionis pait be lauful day

Item the said dai malcom mowet perofferit til vndirly the law bath todo law and
tak law before his Juge ordinar' in the forsaid caus' anent the payment of
the forsaidis obligacionis

Item the said malcum the sammyn dai has constitute Alexander of chavmer of murchil alexander
rede and William blindsel yungar his lauchful procuratouris coniunctlie and seuera
ly anent the said action of the payment of the saidis obligacionis and in al vthir
actionis concerning him / promittand be the fath of his body tilhald ferme and stabil et cetera

The balyeis has assignit til fynlau fores this day xv dais til answer'
as law wil to the borgh strekit on him be John' of lambynton' of xx we
thy of Irne

Item the consale and communite has consentit and ordanit / becaus' of apperance of weyr' / that this toune
be strynthit aboute with certan fossis to the making of the quhilkis thai haf grantit togif
and pay certane contribucion be the ordinance of the aldirman and a certan of the consale

Item the sammyn' dai the balyeis has assignit til thom quhite this day xv dais
as day peremptour with his awn' consent til answer' and vndirly the law / anent the borowis
strekit on him be alexander rolland the tollar' and Wat his son' contenit in ane act made
tharupon' of before / And of xiij d' clamyt be the said alexander for the tol of certane bark

In curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xxj die marcij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxmo Willelmus schethar conuictus
per assisam amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione Andree bowar et tenetur emendare ei vt Jura volunt

xxij die marcij quo supra Alexander rolland burgensis huius burgi coram Andrea branch vno ballivorum constituit
thomam roland suum legittimum procuratorem in omnibus actionibus placitis et querellis ipsum concernentibus / et promi
sit de rato et cetera testibus Johanne Waus Willelmo blindsel Johanne lambynton patricio hil et diuersis aliis

Vicesimotercio die mensis marcij predicti Johannes stevinson' dedit Robertum blindsel plegium legalem
pro eo de indempnitate Johannis stewart aliter quam per viam Juris Et simili modo Johannes de Knollis deuenit
plegium pro Johanne steuart quod Johannes stephani erit indempnis

The sammyn' dai It wes concludit and ordanit be the consale and diuers' of the communite anent the
making of the foss' aboute the ton' / that quhatsumeuir he be indwellar' of this burgh
that beis obstant and contrar' to the making tharof sa fer as pertenis til ilkane todo / that
the aldirman and balyeis be the sycht of certan of the consale sal caus' the sammyn foss'
tobe made apon the costis and expens' of the gainstandaris of the said ordinance

Item the said dai Thomas fife Alexander rede gilbert the vaus William blindsele yungar and
gilbert morison' arbitrouris chosin and sworn betuix Johne Wormot on the ta part / and
Johne of Kintor on the tothir partie thai beand oblist be the faith of thare bodiis til vndir
ly the decrete of the saidis arbitrouris / the quhilkis riply avisit fyndis decretis and
deliueris that the said Johne of Kintor suld content and pay til John' Wormot vj li' v s'
ij d' ob' or ellis tobe allowit to the said Johne Wormot in the xx merkis that he suld
gif til John of Kintor for his half nettis fisching of Done quhilk the said John' Wormot
has in tak of him for this yer' In tocum

The assise deliueris and ordanis that James of Kintor salhaf a quartar nettis fisching
of the pot of William blindsel for this yer' In tocum likand as William blindsel
had his farnyer' / And anent the tothir half net of the sammyn wattir gif Duncan smyth
wil swere that he was redy togif ij barellis of salmond and wald haf gevin thaim to
James of Kintor and that the j barell was sufficiant that he perofferit til the said James
wif / and that he has nocht changit it sen syne and gif thai fynd that it be sufficiant
gude now / Wil blindsel sal haf his wattir and gif thai do nocht James of Kintor
salhaf the wattir / and this tobe done on the next monondai the xxvj dai of merche
